Text:
Bone, I've never had problems like the ones I'm having now. When I try to burn this to a DVD I get no sound. Is there a special codec I need to get ?
 This is a brand new H.P. running Windows 7 Home Premium. I've loaded K-Lite but still no audio.
 Thanks if you can help.
Yes you need to download the Code for window 7 got to www.cnet.com type in codes window 7 and they should bring up a free down load for you.

Yes you need to download the Code for window 7 got to www.cnet.com type in Windows 7 Codec Pack 2.7  and they should bring up a free down load for you. Then follow the promps they give you this should work.
